channel.title: UA races asi+language, tashas custom lineages
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "UA races asi+language, tashas custom lineages"

item.title: Re: UA races asi+language, tashas custom lineages
item.content:encoded:
Thanks Fredbob.

Yeah, its a bit of a weird option, since its not setting specific, its not UA, its not exotic, uncommon or common, its just well yeah.

Where it is is good for now, perhaps if we come up with a better place to put it then we could put it there

once again, Thanks

item.title: Re: UA races asi+language, tashas custom lineages
item.content:encoded: I added Custom Origin as a title item in the Races section of the main page. Not sure if that's where it'll stay, but for now it's at least visible.

item.title: UA races asi+language, tashas custom lineages
item.content:encoded:
fixed the UA origins to include their ASI and language, because i forgot it because im bad at reading.

alongside this, im adding the tasha's custom origin race. Adding it to the front page would be nice, but the question of which category it would be placed in should be debated

thanks

(http://dnd5e.wikidot.com/custom-origin)
